page.title: 06CURRIE PAPERMAKING
page.content: Balerno Paper Mill is owned by the DRG and International Company. Mr.K, a company employee, says that he enjoys his work but that it can get a little boring. Mr.K has been working in the mill for 10 years now. Most of the mill's buildings were completed between 1900 and 1910. The mil has computers in three parts of the works. The mill is a safe place provided the employees do their jobs correctly. The mill employs a total of 104 workers. These people are engineers, mill workers, security officers, technical workers, office staff and management. Some workers have to wear protective clothing such as face masks, respirators and overalls. Materials come from as close as Fife, to as far away as Japan,Germany and Scandinavia. Recently the DRG has been forced to make some redundancies due to losses.
